extends NetObject

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      org.jbox2d.dynamics.Body body
      A Rectangular body that surrounds the player sprite.
      int footCount
      Number of blocks touching the player's foot sensor.
      boolean jumping
      A boolean value where true means that the player is jumping and where false means the player is not.
      long lastJump 
      double runningJump_count
      Represents the frames of the running jump animation.
      org.jbox2d.common.Vec2 size
      Vector representing the width and height of the player object.
      java.lang.String username
      A String that contains the username used to identify the player

        A String that contains the username used to identify the player

        A boolean value where true means that the player is jumping and where false means the player is not.

      • PhysPlayer

        public PhysPlayer(org.jbox2d.dynamics.Body b,
          int n)
        Constructor that stores all information pertaining to the player object.
        Parameters:
        b - hitbox around the player.
        n - player number.

    • Method Detail

      • loadAllModels

        public void loadAllModels()
        Loads all the models.

      • loadAnims

        public void loadAnims(GLModel[] m,
             java.lang.String path)
        Loads all animation files.
        Parameters:
        m - array that must be loaded.
        path - the path name of the required file.

      • keyLeft

        public void keyLeft(float scale,
           int delta)
        If the left key is pressed apply a force based on the two parameters in that direction.
        Parameters:
        scale - the physics scale.
        delta - time since last update.

      • keyRight

        public void keyRight(float scale,
            int delta)
        If the right key is pressed apply a force based on the two parameters in that direction.
        Parameters:
        scale - the physics scale.
        delta - time since last update.

      • keyJump

        public void keyJump()
        If the jump key is pressed apply a force based on the two parameters upwards.

      • jump

        public void jump(int delta)
        Applies upwards force and advances the jumping animation.
        Parameters:
        delta - time since last update.

      • update

        public void update(int delta)
        Advances the player's animation based on its velocity.
        Parameters:
        delta - time since last update.

      • checkDir

        public void checkDir()
        Checks which way the player should be facing. If the player's velocity is less than 0 they will be facing left If the player's velocity is greater than 0 they will be facing right

      • updateRunAnim

        public void updateRunAnim()
        Displays the next frame of the running animation.

      • idle

        public void idle(int delta)
        Begins showing the idle animation if the player is stationary for a predetermined length of time.
        Parameters:
        delta - time since last update.

      • getMessageUpdate

        public Message getMessageUpdate()
        Creates an object that stores all the data required by the client to update the players position.
        Returns:
        message pmsg

      • getX

        public float getX()
        Get the player's x position.
        Returns:
        x position of the body

      • getY

        public float getY()
        Get the player's y position.
        Returns:
        y position of the body

      • render

        public void render()
        Draws the player model.
